item.title: Proven methods to reduce Azure costs for medium size companies and enterprise clients
item.description: Table of contents Compute costs Utilize Spot VMs Utilize Burstable VM sizes Use VM Reserved Instances or Savings Plans Reduce Azure Virtual Desktop (AVD) costs Backup costs Reduce the amount of data stored through backup policies Utilize the archive tier for VM backups Storage costs Replace Premium managed disks with Standard SSD or Ephemeral where possible Use reservation for larger managed disks Utilize lifecycle and cheaper tiers on storage accounts Take care when enabling Microsoft Defender for Storage Ingestion costs Monitor Azure Defender ingestion rate into Log Analytics Workspace Reduce performance counters collection rate Reduce flow of container logs running in Azure Kubernetes Service Last thoughts After working with many clients over the years on their Azure cloud adoption journey, I found that cost optimization was an essential part of many projects I was working on.
